name: ParameterType_useForSnippetsTest
description: Tests for the useForSnippets functionality of the ParameterType class.

test_cases.name: testUseForSnippetsTrue
test_cases.description: Tests that the useForSnippets method returns true when the ParameterType is configured to use for snippets.

test_cases.name: testUseForSnippetsFalse
test_cases.description: Tests that the useForSnippets method returns false when the ParameterType is configured not to use for snippets.
